verses.verse: <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on his <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> met <S%H6293>him.<s%>

When he saw <S%H7200>them,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "This is <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H4264>army.<s%>" He <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4266>Mahanaim.<s%>

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> in front of <S%H6440>him<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> to the <S%H7704>land<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying, "This is what you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> <S%H5650><s%> 'This is what your servant, <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>says.<s%> I have <S%H1481>lived<s%> as a foreigner with <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> and stayed until <S%H309>now.<s%>

I have <S%H7794>cattle,<s%> <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> male <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and female <S%H8198>servants.<s%> I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> that I may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>'"

The <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "We <S%H935>came<s%> to your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%> Not only <S%H1980>that,<s%> but he comes to meet <S%H7125>you,<s%> and four <S%H3967>hundred<s%> men with <S%H376>him.<s%>"

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> and was <S%H3334>distressed.<s%> He <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H6629>him,<s%> and the flocks, and the <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4264>companies;<s%>

and he <S%H559>said,<s%> "If <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4264>company,<s%> and strikes <S%H5221>it,<s%> then the <S%H4264>company<s%> which is <S%H7604>left<s%> will <S%H6413>escape.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7725>me,<s%> 'Return to your <S%H776>country,<s%> and to your <S%H4138>relatives,<s%> and I will do you <S%H3190>good,<s%>'

I am not worthy of the <S%H6994>least<s%> of all the loving <S%H2617>kindnesses,<s%> and of all the <S%H571>truth,<s%> which you have <S%H6213>shown<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for with just my <S%H4731>staff<s%> I passed <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%> and now I have become <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4264>companies.<s%>

Please deliver <S%H5337>me<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H251>brother,<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> for I <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H935>him,<s%> lest he come and strike <S%H5221>me,<s%> and the <S%H517>mothers<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> the <S%H1121>children.<s%>

You <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3190><s%> 'I will surely do you <S%H3190>good,<s%> and <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> which <S%H5608>can't<s%> be numbered because there are so <S%H7230>many.<s%>'"

He <S%H3885>lodged<s%> there that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> from that which he <S%H935>had<s%> with <S%H3027>him,<s%> a <S%H4503>present<s%> for <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> his <S%H251>brother:<s%>
two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> female <S%H5795>goats<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> male <S%H8495>goats,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7353>ewes<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%>

<S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3243>milk<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%> and their <S%H1121>colts,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H6510>cows,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> female <S%H860>donkeys<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5895>foals.<s%>

He <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> every <S%H5739>herd<s%> by <S%H559>itself,<s%> and said to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> "Pass <S%H5674>over<s%> before <S%H6440>me,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7305>space<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H5739>herd<s%> <S%H996>and<s%> <S%H5739>herd.<s%>"

He <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H7223>foremost,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "When <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> my <S%H251>brother,<s%> meets <S%H7592>you,<s%> and asks <S%H7592>you,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7592><s%> 'Whose are you? Where are you <S%H6440>going?<s%> Whose are these before you?'

Then you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5650><s%> 'They are your servant, <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s. It is a <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to my <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%> <S%H310>Behold,<s%> he also is behind us.'"

<S%H6680>He<s%> <S%H1571>commanded<s%> also the <S%H8145>second,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third,<s%> and all that <S%H1980>followed<s%> the <S%H5739>herds,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "This is <S%H1697>how<s%> you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> when you find <S%H4672>him.<s%>

<S%H559>You<s%> shall <S%H1571>say,<s%> 'Not only that, but <S%H559>behold,<s%> your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> is behind <S%H310>us.<s%>'" <S%H559>For,<s%> he said, "I will <S%H3722>appease<s%> <S%H6440>him<s%> with the <S%H4503>present<s%> that goes before <S%H6440>me,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> I will <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H6440>face.<s%> Perhaps he will <S%H5375>accept<s%> <S%H6440>me.<s%>"
<S%H5674>So<s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> before <S%H6440>him,<s%> and he himself <S%H3885>lodged<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

He rose <S%H6965>up<s%> that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8198>handmaids,<s%> and his <S%H6240>eleven<s%> <S%H3206>sons,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H4569>ford<s%> of the <S%H2999>Jabbok.<s%>
He took <S%H3947>them,<s%> and sent <S%H3947>them<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5674>stream,<s%> and sent over that which he had.
<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H79>alone,<s%> and wrestled with a <S%H376>man<s%> there until the <S%H5927>breaking<s%> of the <S%H7837>day.<s%>

When he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he <S%H3201>didn't<s%> prevail against <S%H5060>him,<s%> he touched the hollow of his <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> and the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H3409>thigh<s%> was <S%H3363>strained,<s%> as he <S%H79>wrestled.<s%>

The man <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let me <S%H7971>go,<s%> for the <S%H7837>day<s%> <S%H5927>breaks.<s%>" Jacob <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7971>won't<s%> let you go, <S%H518>unless<s%> you bless <S%H1288>me.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8034>him,<s%> "What is your name?" He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3290>"Jacob.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H8034>name<s%> will no longer be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> but <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for you <S%H8280>have<s%> fought with <S%H430>God<s%> and with <S%H582>men,<s%> and have <S%H3201>prevailed.<s%>"

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> "Please <S%H5046>tell<s%> me your <S%H8034>name.<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Why is <S%H2088>it<s%> that you <S%H7592>ask<s%> what my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1288>is?<s%>" He blessed him there.

<S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6439>Peniel:<s%> <S%H7200>for,<s%> he said, "I have seen <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face,<s%> and my <S%H5315>life<s%> is <S%H5337>preserved.<s%>"
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rose<s%> on him as he passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6439>Peniel,<s%> and he <S%H6760>limped<s%> because of his <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>don't<s%> eat the <S%H1517>sinew<s%> of the <S%H5384>hip,<s%> which is on the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of the <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> because he <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H3709>hollow<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>'s <S%H3409>thigh<s%> in the <S%H1517>sinew<s%> of the <S%H5384>hip.<s%>
